detail_desc: Baby Exclusive. Dungarees in soft, organic cotton corduroy with buttons at the sides and straps with adjustable buttoning at the front. Elastication at the back of the waist, and elasticated hems. Concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs (except in sizes 1½-4Y). Lined at the top.
Pyjama T-shirt and shorts in soft cotton jersey. T-shirt with a print motif on the front and shorts with an elasticated waist.
Shorts in printed lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Lined bandeau bikini top with side support and cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Narrow, double shoulder straps, and a drawstring front and back. No fasteners.

Shirt in soft twill with a brushed finish. Turn-down collar, classic front, open chest pocket, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement over the shoulders and chest to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Rib-knit jumper in soft chenille yarn. Long sleeves with ribbed cuffs and ribbing around the neckline and hem.
Imitation suede cap with an adjustable tab and metal fastener at the back.
Ankle boots with a zip in one side and a loop at the back. Satin linings and imitation leather insoles. Heel 6 cm.

Trousers in a soft, patterned viscose weave with a high drawstring waist with elastication at the back and pleats at the top. Side pockets and straight, wide legs with a trim down the sides and at the hem.

Soft, non-wired bras in organic cotton jersey with adjustable shoulder straps and lined, opening cups with removable inserts and space for nursing pads. Elasticated hem and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Sports cap in a recycled polyester weave with a moisture-absorbing terry band on the inside and tab with an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Round-necked jumper in soft, rib-knit cashmere with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and wide ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Deck shoes in cotton canvas with imitation leather sections, elasticated lacing at the top and lacing details. Fabric linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Slip-on trainers in cotton canvas with a padded top edge, elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Cotton canvas linings and insoles and fluted soles.
Square scarf in a soft weave.
Sleeveless, knee-length dress in ribbed jersey with a V-neck, narrow shoulder straps and a straight-cut back with a slit.
Baby Exclusive. Cardigan in soft, fine-knit organic cotton with a round neck and buttons down the front.
Tunic in woven fabric with a V-neck, yoke with a pleat at the back, detachable tie belt at the waist and buttoned cuffs. Unlined.

Checked Oxford cotton shirt with a button-down collar, open chest pocket and yoke with a hanger loop at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Short dress in an airy, patterned weave with a small frilled collar and V-neck opening with ties at the front. Long, raglan balloon sleeves with a covered button at the cuffs, a gathered seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Jersey lining.
T-shirt in soft, organic cotton jersey with a narrow ribbed trim around the neckline.
Calf-length skirt in an airy, patterned viscose weave with a high waist that is elasticated at the back and has ties at the front. Longer at the back. Unlined.
Ankle-length treggings in cotton sweatshirt fabric. Skinny fit with a ribbed, easy pull-on, elasticated waist. Fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
5-pocket low-rise jeans in washed stretch denim with a button fly and skinny legs with darker stripes down the sides and raw-edge hems..
Double-layered hat in a soft, fine knit containing glittery threads with an interactive motif on the front.

Long, straight-cut shirt in an airy linen and cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Dropped shoulders, short sleeves with a tab and button, and slits in the sides of the hem.
Leggings in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Straight-cut, double-breasted jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, buttons at the front and welt front pockets with a flap. Lined in recycled polyester.
High-waisted jeans in washed superstretch denim with a zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs.
Boxy-style jumper in a soft knit with a small stand-up collar, low dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves with close-fitting cuffs.

Strapless bandeau bra in jersey with padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Wide, ribbed trim at the hem and no fasteners. The bra is designed with the minimum number of seams for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin.

5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs. Shaping – denim with a stretch function that holds in and shapes the waist, thighs and bum while keeping the jeans in shape.
Short, A-line skirt with buttons down the front.
Knee-length shorts in sweatshirt fabric with a low crotch, elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, back pockets and ribbed hems.

Slim-fit biker jeans in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button. Front and back pockets, and legs with decorative stitching and slim hems.
Long-sleeved dress in patterned organic cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Ballet pumps in woven fabric with broderie anglaise. Concealed elastication at the heels, fabric linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and ribbed neckline.
Long-sleeved top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a reversible sequin motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Alice band with an appliqué decoration on top.
Lightweight, unlined sports socks in fast-drying functional fabric with a short, ribbed shaft.
Top in sturdy jersey with a wrapover funnel collar with a drawstring. Kangaroo pocket, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Wide blouse in an airy cotton weave with a V-neck, 3/4-length sleeves with ties at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Short-sleeved top in printed cotton jersey.

Set with a long-sleeved blouse in a cotton weave and a pair of leggings in jersey. Blouse with a frill-trimmed yoke, button placket and long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Leggings with an elasticated waist.

Shirt in soft, checked cotton flannel with a button-down collar, classic front and yoke with a pleat and hanger at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement over the shoulders and chest which, combined with a gently tapered waist, creates a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Off-the-shoulder blouse in a crinkled weave containing some linen with elastication and smocking around the top and long sleeves with smocking at the cuffs.

Double-breasted trenchcoat in sturdy twill containing some wool. Collar, shoulder tabs with a button, side pockets and a single back vent. Tab and buckle and a small slit at the cuffs, and an adjustable belt at the waist. Lined.
Jersey T-shirt.

Set with a long-sleeved shirt, waistcoat, bow tie and pair of trousers. Shirt in a cotton weave with a button-down collar, buttons down the front and buttoned cuffs. Waistcoat in a lightly brushed weave with buttons at the front and a back made from lining fabric. Bow tie with an adjustable elastic strap and plastic fastener at the back. Trousers in a lightly brushed weave with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly and button, fake front pockets and a fake welt back pocket.
Flip-flops in imitation patent leather.
Leggings in sturdy cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and a motif. Soft brushed inside.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.
Joggers in supersoft, stretch denim with a ribbed, elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, front pockets and a welt back pocket. Tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Metal rings in various shapes and designs.

Lightly padded jacket in woven fabric with a padded hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front. Gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs, side pockets and a drawstring at the hem. Lined. Polyester filling.

Shirt in cotton corduroy with a button-down collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Open chest pocket and long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs and a sleeve placket with a link button. Rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Long-sleeved top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a motif, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.
Fitted jersey top with a heart-shaped neckline and long sleeves.
Cardigan in a soft rib knit with dropped shoulders and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs. No buttons.
Dress in an airy patterned weave with a concealed zip at the back, long sleeves, seam at the waist and asymmetric skirt. Unlined.
Hipster briefs in microfibre with a wide lace trim at the back. Low waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
Short-sleeved top in ribbed jersey with a stand-up collar and straight hem.
Triangle bikini top with removable inserts and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back. Wide elastic trim at the hem and no fasteners.
Jacket in soft fleece with a stand-up collar, fleece-lined hood and a yoke in woven fabric. Zip down the front with a chin guard and a zipped front pocket. Rounded and longer at the back.
Long, flared skirt in softly draping, voluminous tulle with elastication at the back of the waist. Lined with a layer of chiffon and a layer of jersey.
Sports top in sturdy jersey with a flock print on the front and long sleeves with thumbholes at the cuffs. Longer and rounded at the front.

5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with hard-worn details, a high waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs with raw-edge hems. Embrace – denim with a smart stretch function that moulds to the body for a comfortable, flattering silhouette.
Straight-style, cold shoulder blouse in stripe-print poplin with embroidery, narrow shoulder straps and short sleeves that are elasticated at the top.
High-waisted lace and microfibre briefs. Wide elastication at the waist with an opening at the back, a lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
Polo-neck jumper in fine-knit premium cotton with ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Calf-length skirt in airy, patterned crêpe with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening at one side and a flounced, wrapover front. Wide flounce at the hem. Longer at the back. Unlined.

Single-breasted jacket in a stretch weave with narrow notch lapels with a decorative buttonhole, a chest pocket, flap front pockets and one inner pocket. Two buttons at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Slim fit that tapers at the chest and waist which, combined with slightly narrower sleeves, creates a fitted silhouette.
Slightly shorter, wide jumper knitted in a soft cotton blend with dropped shoulders and wide ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Off-the-shoulder maxi dress in soft viscose jersey with a heavy drape. Short sleeves, elastication and a wide flounce at the top, an elasticated seam below the bust and gently flared skirt with high slits at the front. Unlined.
Calf-length dress in a plumeti weave with a V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the front and short sleeves. Smocked seam at the waist and a softly draping skirt. Unlined.
Block-coloured swimsuit with a small stand-up collar, 3/4-length raglan sleeves and short legs. Zip with a zip guard at the back. UPF 50.
Poncho in a soft jacquard knit containing glittery threads with a ribbed polo neck and fringed hem.
Jumper in loose-knit tape yarn with a slightly wider neckline, dropped shoulders, long sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.

Padded jacket with a padded, lined, faux fur-trimmed hood, zip down the front and seam at the waist. Handwarmer pockets with a press-stud, zipped side pockets and zips at the sides. Lined, partly in faux fur.
